message_1: What is the balanced chemical equation for the double replacement reaction between barium chloride (BaCl2) and potassium sulfate (K2SO4)?
message_2:
The balanced chemical equation for the double replacement reaction between barium chloride (BaCl2) and potassium sulfate (K2SO4) is:

BaCl2 (aq) + K2SO4 (aq) â†’ BaSO4 (s) + 2 KCl (aq)
